officialTitle: A Pilot Study of Hemoporfin Photodynamic Therapy in Children (7-14 Years Old) With Port-wine Stain
inclusionCriteria:
* Children with clinical diagnosis of PWS；
* Age range: 7 to 14 years-old；
* Voluntarily participated and Written informed consent signed
* Must have minimum age of 7 Years
* Must have maximum age of 14 Years
